headline: TFC Q4 Deep Dive: Digital Investments, Loan Growth, and Strategic Branch Expansion Shape Outlook
summary: Financial services company Truist Financial (NYSE:TFC) met Wall Streets revenue expectations in Q4 CY2025, with sales up 3.6% year on year to $5.30 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.12 per share was 2.5% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
